export.name: Unified Bag Layout
export.description: Clean and efficient bag organization with search, sorting, and guild bank integration
export.setupInstructions:
1. Install Baganator addon from CurseForge
2. Type `/baganator` in-game to open settings
3. Navigate to 'Profiles' section
4. Click 'Import Profile' button
5. Paste the export string and confirm
6. Customize categories and sorting rules as desired
